messages.title: STOP THE FLOOD OF HOUSING DEVELOPMENTS
messages.content: I am determined to do all I can to stop the flood of speculative housing applications that are the result of deliberate government policy and local Conservative incompetence.

messages.title: SAVE OUR SCHOOLS
messages.content: "If the Conservative proposals go through then Cheshire East schools will be the worst funded in the borough, and many staff may lose their jobs. Some schools may have to move to a 4 day week. Sam is an effective campaigner; this should never have got to this stage." - Martin Forster, Former Head Teacher at Middlewich High School

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose over development and ensure a balance in housing with more standing against while developments. Promise to give more weight to local opinion on what sort of houses should be built and build more council houses.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: AIR QUALITY IN CONGLETON, SANDBACH AND MIDDLEWICH
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Improve air quality and address the impact it has on health.
Reform the tax system to make it fairer.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can beat the Conservatives

housing.content: Conservatives Have Allowed a Flood of House Building on Green Fields - need to stop speculative housing applications and give more weight to local opinion on housing, and build more council houses.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am determined to do all I can to stop the flood of speculative housing applications that are the result of deliberate government policy and local Conservative incompetence.

politicalExperience.role: Councillor on the Cheshire East Local Plan
politicalExperience.achievements: Worked on the development of the Cheshire East Local Plan that suggests the 'green gap' near Willaston could be used for 150 housing houses in the recent Supreme Court judgement.

endorsements.endorsement: Sam is an effective campaigner; this should never have got to this stage.

quotes.text: Only Labour can beat the Conservatives.

images.caption: Sam Corcoran holding a Labour rosette.
